abstracts.cdata!:
It is the principal finding of this
            Environmental Assessment (EA), conducted as part of the
            Third Forestry Development Project (Forestry III)
            pre-appraisal and appraisal missions, that the project
            activities are of the highest government priority in terms
            of forest conservation and  management, and economic
            development.  Forestry III is an opportunity for the Royal
            Government of Bhutan (RGOB), The World Bank (WB), and the
            Swiss Development Corporation (SDC) to cooperate in
            developing sustainable forestry alternatives for the Eastern
            Zone of Bhutan.  It is particularly important that Forestry
            III will begin to focus on the sustainable management of the
            most threatened of Bhutan's forests: broadleaf forests
            in subtropical, warm temperate and cool temperate climate regions.
